title: installation could be friendly with traditional configure-make
body:
by **jyrki.wahlstedt**: 
The current installation system means having to define a couple environment 
variables not normally present. This is ok, in case one is doing the build 
manually. If one wants to make the build automatically, e.g. on a system like 
BSD ports (an example is MacPorts on OS X), this makes it quite hard.
To enable automatic builds for these packaging systems would be nice.

This would obviously be an enhancement.
